entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
